name: .CRC File Extension
summary: Learn about .CRC files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File created by Total Commander, a program used to organize and manage files in Windows; contains a Cyclic Redundancy Check (CRC) code for a split archive; used to verify that files from a split archive have correctly been restored back to the original file.

content: Total Commander is similar to Windows Explorer, except it enables additional functionality, such as packing and unpacking files, accessing FTP servers, and comparing the content of files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
